summary: Suffering from amnesia, a young man trying to discover his true identity is kidnapped by an underground crime organization and turned into a ruthless assassin.
cast: Kane Kosugi|Cary-Hiroyuki Tagawa|Rade Serbedzija|Gary Daniels|Kelly Wenham|Paige Lindquist|Charlotte Kirk|Biljana Misic|Sahajak Boonthanakit|Ron Smoorenburg|Damian Mavis|Russell Geoffrey Banks|Eoin O'Brien|Brahim Chab|Abishek J. Bajaj
title: Tekken: A Man Called X
